content:
You are a reader assistant. You simplify a passage from a scientific paper to make it more readable by performing an iterative algorithm that focuses on atomic changes.

You are also given two parameters: DC (Desired Complexity) – a desired complexity of the simplified text, and ILT (Information Loss Tolerance) – a threshold for information loss compared to original passage that specifies whether an atomic change should be accepted or not.

The algorithm is as follows:
1. Determine if the text is at desired complexity (DC), if yes, terminate the algorithm, else continue.
2. Identify a section of the text whose complexity is above DC.
3. Propose a simplification of the identified section.
4. Identify information loss and the severity of it – if the severity for any of the information loss questions is higher than information loss tolerance (ILT), reject changes, else update the current state of the passage
5. Adjust the passage to maintain readability and flow of text, then run a new iteration of the algorithm.

When the algorithm terminates, you print the original and simplified passages

The passage:
Our model is made of residual convolutional blocks with hierarchical dilated skip connections joined in steps.

DC: University student
ILT: Medium
Identify the complexity level of the passage

The complexity level of the passage is high. It includes technical terms such as "residual convolutional blocks," "hierarchical dilated skip connections," and "joined in steps," which may be difficult for a university student to fully understand without additional context or background knowledge in the field of machine learning or computer vision. The use of jargon contributes to its complexity.
Is determined complexity higher than DC (University student)? Answer "Yes" or "No"
Yes.
Identify a single complicated section of the passage
The section "residual convolutional blocks with hierarchical dilated skip connections" is complicated.
Simplify this section
"blocks that help improve the learning process with special connections that allow information to flow more easily"
Reincorporate the simplified section into the passage
Our model is made of blocks that help improve the learning process with special connections that allow information to flow more easily, joined in steps.
Identify information loss and its severity in the updated passage compared to the original

The information loss in the updated passage is moderate. While the essence of the model's structure is retained, the specific technical terms "residual convolutional blocks" and "hierarchical dilated skip connections" are lost, which might provide important details about the model's architecture and functionality. This could make it difficult for someone familiar with the original terminology to fully understand the technical nuances of the model. Overall, the simplification loses some specificity without changing the fundamental idea, which impacts technical accuracy, reflecting a severity that exceeds the medium threshold for ILT.
What is the highest severity level identified? Is it higher than ILT (Medium)? Answer "Yes" or "No"
Yes.
Revert the last proposed change. In further iterations you may still attempt to simplify this section in other ways

The original passage is:  
"Our model is made of residual convolutional blocks with hierarchical dilated skip connections joined in steps."
Identify the complexity level of the passage

The complexity level of the passage is high. It contains specialized terms such as "residual convolutional blocks," "hierarchical dilated skip connections," and "joined in steps," which may be challenging for a university student to comprehend without background knowledge in areas like machine learning or computer vision. The use of technical jargon increases its complexity.
Is determined complexity higher than DC (University student)? Answer "Yes" or "No"
Yes.
Identify a single complicated section of the passage
The section "residual convolutional blocks with hierarchical dilated skip connections" is complicated.
Simplify this section
"advanced model components that help in processing data with special connections for better information sharing"
Reincorporate the simplified section into the passage
Our model is made of advanced model components that help in processing data with special connections for better information sharing, joined in steps.
Identify information loss and its severity in the updated passage compared to the original

The information loss in the updated passage is moderate. While the simplified version retains the general idea that the model consists of components and connections, it loses specific terminology, such as "residual convolutional blocks" and "hierarchical dilated skip connections." This loss of precise technical terms decreases the accuracy and specificity of the description regarding the model's architecture and may obscure important details about how the model functions. The severity of this information loss is significant but not as high as in the previous attempt, reflecting a severity that is still above the medium threshold for ILT.
What is the highest severity level identified? Is it higher than ILT (Medium)? Answer "Yes" or "No"
Yes.
Revert the last proposed change. In further iterations you may still attempt to simplify this section in other ways

The original passage is:  
"Our model is made of residual convolutional blocks with hierarchical dilated skip connections joined in steps."
Identify the complexity level of the passage

The complexity level of the passage is high. It includes specialized and technical terms such as "residual convolutional blocks," "hierarchical dilated skip connections," and "joined in steps," which may be difficult for a university student to fully understand without relevant background knowledge in machine learning or computer vision. The use of these technical terms contributes to its overall complexity.
Is determined complexity higher than DC (University student)? Answer "Yes" or "No"
Yes.

Simplify this section
"connections that allow multiple paths for information to travel, improving data processing"
Reincorporate the simplified section into the passage

Identify information loss and its severity in the updated passage compared to the original

The information loss in the updated passage is moderate. The simplified version retains the general concept of connections and their purpose but loses the specific term "hierarchical dilated skip connections," which conveys details about the structure and function of the connections. This loss impacts the precise understanding of how the model operates and may reduce clarity for individuals familiar with the original terminology. The severity of this information loss is enough to indicate a level that exceeds the medium threshold for ILT.
What is the highest severity level identified? Is it higher than ILT (Medium)? Answer "Yes" or "No"
Yes.
Revert the last proposed change. In further iterations you may still attempt to simplify this section in other ways

The information loss in the updated passage is moderate. The simplified phrase "blocks that help enhance the learning process" retains the basic function of the original term "residual convolutional blocks," but it loses the specific terminology and the technical nuances associated with "residual" and "convolutional." This reduction in specificity may hinder the understanding of the model's precise architecture and how it achieves its learning objectives. The severity of this information loss is significant enough to indicate that it exceeds the medium threshold for ILT.
